content: are you looking for a quick easy festive gift to whip up for christmas this year this pattern is just for you working up in an hour or less this adorable accessory is great for last minute gifting white elephant parties secret santa exchanges stocking stuffers and more it takes very little yarn can be customized to fit any cup size and it s even beginner friendly so grab your hook and let s get started **materials** 4 5mm hook 25 30yds of yarn base color 2yds of yarn tree color optional 1 festive button optional sewing needle optional sewing thread **us terminology** chain slip_stitch single_crochet
